capetas.descricao: Apaixone-se pela sua vida a cada segundo!

depoimentos.depoimento: Make the lie big, make it simple, keep saying it, and eventually they will believe it.
A boy's best friend is his mother.
It's hard for me to believe that a human being could have done what I've done, but I know that I did it.

capetas.descricao: Aprender a se amar é um exercício gradual. 👌😉💖

depoimentos.depoimento: I don't care if I live or die. Go ahead and kill me.

capetas.descricao: Ele é toda dele e não de quem quiser! 💋💥
Quando me amei de verdade deixei de precisar das coisas e das pessoas pra me sentir segura. ✨🌸

depoimentos.depoimento: I made my fantasy life more powerful than my real one.
Who says I am not under the special protection of God?
She might have fooled me, but she didn't fool my mother.
Yes, I always had that sense it was wrong. I don’t think anybody can kill somebody and think that it’s right.

capetas.descricao: Eu nunca perco! Ou eu ganho ou aprendo. 😏👌

depoimentos.depoimento: If it all happens naturalistically, what's the need for a God? Can't I set my own rules? Who owns me? I own myself.

I was completely swept along with my own compulsion. I don't know how else to put it. It didn't satisfy me completely, so maybe I was thinking, 'Maybe another one will. Maybe this one will.' And the numbers started growing and growing and just got out of control, as you can see.
